Original:
[Happy hour]
玉米脆片好吃，辣度夠、層次豐富，牛小排一般，但醬汁感覺有用心，酒種除了金牌台啤，推薦IPA，另一種（名稱聽沒聽清楚）對我而言太甜（本身完全不吃甜）。（要不是我還在宿醉不然感覺可以喝8-9杯，距離打烊還有15分鐘，目前5杯。）
EN:
[Happy Hour]
The corn crisp slices are delicious, the spicy degree is enough, the layers are rich, and the cow is average, but the sauce feels attentive. The wine species is not only a gold medal Taiwan beer, and the IPA is recommended. The other (the name is not clear) Sweet (not sweet at all).(If it weren't for me, I still feel that I can drink 8-9 cups, and there are 15 minutes from snoring. Currently 5 cups.)

Original:
以下是針對The Mesh Kitchen的評論
我們是在週末的晚間前往用餐，對於八里福朋喜來登的印象非常的好，而最主要的原因是服務人員相當親切，隨時注意飯店內(含住宿等)所有賓客的需求，並及時提供需要的服務。
用餐環境相當乾淨整潔，雖然取餐動線的設計會讓部分用餐的顧客感到壅擠，例如，甜點櫃台旁有臥榻式的用餐區，在餐期前，排隊取餐的顧客，會讓坐在靠近走道的顧客感受到壓迫感，影響用餐的氣氛，而餐期後段，又因為排隊拿取冰淇淋的顧客會聚集，其實，用餐時頗受影響，除此之外，用餐環境算是相當不錯。
在餐點上面，補餐的速度蠻快的，因為個人喜歡干貝的關係，生食級的干貝提供，是最滿意的部分。而其他餐點，大致上和其他的自助式餐廳差異不大，希望未來再訪時，能夠有菜色的變換，以保持餐點樣式的新鮮感。
EN:
The following are reviewed for The Mesh Kitchen
I went to the meal evening at the evening of the weekend, very good for the Great Fortress Gods, and the main reason the service personnel were quite friendly, at any time to pay attention to the demand for all guests in the hotel (including accommodation), and provided the need for timelyservice.
The dining environment is quite clean and tidy, although the design will make some dining customers feel the squeeze, for example, next to the dessert counter there is a lying-estation dining area next to the dessert counter, before the meal period, queuing to pick up a meal customer, will let the houseClose to the entrance to customers who feel the sense of oppression, affect the atmosphere of the dining room, and the post-date period, and because the queue to pick up the ice to the ice cream will be gathered, in fact, the dining environment is quite good when the dining environment is quite affected.
On the meals, the speed of the meal is fast, because personally prefer to dry mussels, raw food grades are provided, the most satisfying part of the raw food grade.and other meals, roughly and other buffet restaurants differentially differently, hoped to have a change in cuisine in the future to keep the meals in the future to keep the meals fresh.
